news_header: Royal Caribbean reports strong earnings while Danaher falls short of expectations.
news_text: Royal Caribbean's Q4 earnings rose by 34.4% year-over-year, supported by a 12.9% increase in revenues, indicating strong operational momentum. In contrast, Danaher Corp's results were below estimates, leading to disappointing guidance and a 2.5% drop in shares. The Tech sector continues to show robust growth, with expected earnings up 15.2% in Q4 2024. Overall, 2025 is projected to see earnings growth across all sectors, with many expected to achieve double-digit growth.
